page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT IN S. HEDINGHAM
page.content: Sible Hedingham has many places that employ people. The majority of parents work in the village but many go to Sudbury, Halstead,Braintree and many other places to work. People who live in surrounding villages come into Sible Hedingham to work. {Rippers Timberyard}and{Tanners {Dairy}employ a large number of people. The{two schools}employ approximately 120 people and the{Co-op Supermarket} employs 16 people. Other local employ- ment includes{shops,garages,health} {services and offices.} In the local newspapers and some shop windows they advertise job vacancies. Unemployment in the area is fairly low and only affects a small number of people in the village.
